Subject: Slow computer performance
Description: Hey there, my computer's been running really slow lately. It's taking forever to open up applications and documents. It's really affecting my work. Can you guys check it out?

Subject: Printer not printing
Description: Hi, I've been trying to print some documents from the office printer but it's just not working. It's not even making any noise or anything. Could you help me with this?

Subject: Emails not syncing
Description: Hello, my emails are not syncing properly on my laptop. I'm missing out on important stuff and it's really frustrating. Can you look into this issue?

Subject: Software installation error
Description: Hi there, I'm trying to install a new software on my system but it's showing some error. I'm not really tech-savvy so not sure what to do. Please help.

Subject: Internet connection issues
Description: Hey, I've been having trouble with my internet connection. It's been on and off and it's really affecting my work. I need this fixed as soon as possible please.
